mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffee_board_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleteContent, regdate FROM coffee_board_comment WHERE ref_group=#{num} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE coffee_board_comment SET content='삭제된 댓글입니다.', deleteContent=1 where num=#{num}
UPDATE coffee_board_comments SET content=#{content} where num=#{num}
